name: Hero Defeater
description:
Made this for Mini Jam 120: Hell (The player cannot harm).

This is a twist of the Vampire Survivor, except it's your role to stop the hero!

The hero has gotten too strong! There's only a few minutes before the big guy has to step in and you don't want that! Unfortunately you can't actually harm the hero, but you can heal your minions! As well as healing, you can also steal the hero's gems before they can pick them up and level up!

I had a lot of fun making this, but I didn't have enough time to properly balance it/add more stuff in time!

Font: https://www.dafont.com/melted-monster.font?back=theme

SFX: Created on https://sfxr.me/
